Grabba designs and builds state-of-the-art smartphone and tablet attachments for use in data capture, data verification, transaction processing, and more. Biometric FBI quality Fingerprint Reader. HID iCLASS-SE Scanning Passport, Smart Card, Barcode, Machine Readable Zone Certifications FBI Compliance Ruggedness IP54 See All Technologies Award winning solutions. Forward-thinking organisations around the world are using Grabba to optimise operations, make predictive decisions, and deliver better business and social outcomes. POLICE & SECURITY TRAVEL & LEISURE OPERATIONS MANAGEMENT PROFESSIONAL SERVICES 1000+ Customers around the world. Our customers span across the world in around 80 different countries. The Grabba Guarantee Extended Warranty Extended period of coverage for factory faulty products or accessories. Upgradeable Program Update Grabba devices to newer mobile phone models or technologies Grabba Help Dedicated engineering team for software and hardware support. World-wide repair facilities. How can we help? We're driven by a passion for R&D and implementing solutions that enable our customers to work more efficiently and accurately across every industry.
